name: 2048 cooker
description:
control:
Awsd or keyboard, or swip on screen to move items on board

This is a game for game jam https://itch.io/jam/vmj2020

The theme is this:

I interpret it as a bbq grill and some food on it.

I tried to combine 2048 and a cooking game together and here is the game.

The game is not fully polished as it does not have a game over now.
